actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to take certain action so as to assure the maintenance of operations involving the transporting, by truck or trucks, of perishable food, including fruit, vegetables, meats, and all seafood items.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to assure the maintenance of operations involving the transporting, by truck or trucks, of perishable food, including fruit, vegetables, meats, and all seafood items by allocating such operations 100 percent of their current fuel needs.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office to take certain action so as to assure the maintenance of operations involving the transporting, by truck or trucks, of perishable food, including fruit, vegetables, meats, and all seafood items.
